audioText: Marie arrangera tout le programme de la conférence avant la fin de la semaine prochaine.
question: When will Marie organize the conference program?
options: Marie will arrange the program by the end of next week
Marie has already arranged the conference program
Marie will arrange the program after next week
Marie is arranging the program right now
explanation: The text states 'Marie arrangera tout le programme de la conférence avant la fin de la semaine prochaine' - Marie will arrange the entire conference program before the end of next week. 'Arrangera' is the future tense of 'arranger' (to arrange), indicating a future action with a specific deadline.
